name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.3-cd4c6d0d27525513a52d2f54a56f8f5ede555f82 "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
